CustomField.formula:
IMAGE(
"https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=" + Ligne1__c + "," + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (Ligne2__c)), Ligne2__c + ",", "" ) + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (Ligne3__c)), Ligne3__c + ",", "" ) + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (Ligne4__c)), Ligne4__c + ",", "" ) + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (TEXT(Province__c))), TEXT(Province__c) + ",", "" ) + CodePostal__c + "+" + Ville__c + "," + TEXT ( Pays__c ) + "&zoom=13&size=250x250&markers=color:red|" + Ligne1__c + "+" + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (Ligne2__c)), Ligne2__c + ",", "" ) + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (Ligne3__c)), Ligne3__c + ",", "" ) + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (Ligne4__c)), Ligne4__c + ",", "" ) + IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK (TEXT(Province__c))), TEXT(Province__c) + ",", "" ) + CodePostal__c + "+" + Ville__c + "," + TEXT ( Pays__c ) + "&sensor=true"
, $Label.CON_Carte_AucuneCarteDispo , 250, 250)
CustomField.label: Carte
